scenes.description: Performance of the song 'LAKI MODE' by the unit LAKI MODE.
Interlude and transition to Todoroki Hajime's solo performance.
Solo performance of the song 'BANDAGE' by Todoroki Hajime.

subtitles.original: ...ちゃちゃ酔わせてよ LAKI MODE
subtitles.english: ...cha-cha, let me get drunk, LAKI MODE

subtitles.original: キミだけのプレイリスト
subtitles.english: Your very own playlist

subtitles.original: マイフロー耳元まで運ぶよ
subtitles.english: My flow, I'll carry it to your ears

subtitles.original: Don't be shy, emotion
subtitles.english: Don't be shy, emotion

subtitles.original: Don't be shy, LAKI MODE
subtitles.english: Don't be shy, LAKI MODE

subtitles.original: 闇を照らすオーロラ
subtitles.english: Aurora that lights up the darkness

subtitles.original: 言葉いらずのオリマー
subtitles.english: No need for words, All in my

subtitles.original: 踊ってたいずっと
subtitles.english: I want to keep dancing forever

subtitles.original: またとないこの日を
subtitles.english: This one-of-a-kind day

subtitles.original: 降り注ぐプラズマ
subtitles.english: Pouring plasma

subtitles.original: キミがいればプラスワン
subtitles.english: If you're here, it's a plus one

subtitles.original: 色濃く映そう VIVIDなハイライト
subtitles.english: Let's show it vividly, VIVID highlights

subtitles.original: やみつきになる Dance Dance
subtitles.english: It's addictive, Dance Dance

subtitles.original: ハイになるまで I I
subtitles.english: Until we're high, I I

subtitles.original: 寝ても覚めても 華やぐトワイライト
subtitles.english: Asleep or awake, the twilight flourishes

subtitles.original: きらめいたら Nice Nice
subtitles.english: If it sparkles, Nice Nice

subtitles.original: もっと光 I Ice
subtitles.english: More light, I Ice

subtitles.original: 感性の奇劇にふっと酔いしれた
subtitles.english: Suddenly intoxicated by the comedy of sensibility

subtitles.original: そんな野蛮な季節は通り過ぎた
subtitles.english: That barbaric season has passed

subtitles.original: みんなホトほと知らずなぐらいが一番ちょうどいい
subtitles.english: It's just right when everyone is somewhat oblivious

subtitles.original: 甘めにフィルタかけて強気のヒビ
subtitles.english: Apply a sweet filter and have confident days

subtitles.original: 続、バラバラの sense of unity
subtitles.english: Continuation, a scattered sense of unity

subtitles.original: ワンランク上果たす現状維持
subtitles.english: Maintaining the status quo while going up a level

subtitles.original: 隣り合わせ反応するメロディ
subtitles.english: Melodies reacting side-by-side

subtitles.original: まるで狂信的、キミの殿堂入り
subtitles.english: Like a fanatic, inducted into your Hall of Fame

subtitles.original: 染まる心、瞳めがけ覚醒
subtitles.english: A dyed heart, awakening towards the eyes

subtitles.original: バース後の精度も超え
subtitles.english: Exceeding even the precision after the verse

subtitles.original: 沸き余った距離さえも Kilometers
subtitles.english: Even the boiling distance is Kilometers

subtitles.original: 天使みたく舞い踊るクリオーネ
subtitles.english: Dancing like an angel, Clione

subtitles.original: 夢中になっていた頃には
subtitles.english: By the time I was engrossed

subtitles.original: 時は行方を眩ませた
subtitles.english: Time had vanished

subtitles.original: 幸せ運ぶ水星が
subtitles.english: The comet bringing happiness

subtitles.original: オーバーフロー満たしていく世界中
subtitles.english: Filling the world with an overflow

subtitles.original: Don't be shy, emotion
subtitles.english: Don't be shy, emotion

subtitles.original: Don't be shy, LAKI MODE
subtitles.english: Don't be shy, LAKI MODE

subtitles.english: If it sparkles, Nice Nice

subtitles.original: もっと光 I Ice
subtitles.english: More light, I Ice

subtitles.original: あ、待って
subtitles.english: Ah, wait

subtitles.original: Stay up she said 立たせて
subtitles.english: Stay up she said, let me stand

subtitles.original: 死に腐れた態度じゃ不合格です
subtitles.english: A dead, rotten attitude is a failing grade

subtitles.original: 不幸中の幸いは飽きてしまうわ
subtitles.english: I'll get tired of the silver lining in misfortune

subtitles.original:
BANDAGE
作詞・作曲：Ayumu Imazu
subtitles.english:
BANDAGE
Lyrics/Composition: Ayumu Imazu

subtitles.original: Get up 目を覚まして
subtitles.english: Get up, open your eyes

subtitles.original: いい加減ななりに黙って頷いてちゃ
subtitles.english: Just shut up and keep nodding in your haphazard way

subtitles.original: Non non non のびしろがないわ
subtitles.english: Non-non-non, there's no room for growth

subtitles.original: I got 1 2 3 4 5 6 のまま 稚拙でいいからまとまらず I want to
subtitles.english: I got 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6 as it is, it's fine to be childish, without a plan, I want to

subtitles.original: Falling out falling out away 追いかける yesterday
subtitles.english: Falling out, falling out away, chasing yesterday

subtitles.original: 決める覚悟 迷いは捨て
subtitles.english: The resolution to decide, discard hesitation

subtitles.original: 風が止まっても研ぎ澄ませ
subtitles.english: Even if the wind stops, sharpen up

subtitles.original: 駆け引きなんていらない say
subtitles.english: I don't need any bargaining, say

subtitles.original: What you wanna say
subtitles.english: What you wanna say

subtitles.original: 指名通りの希望はブルー
subtitles.english: The hope as requested is blue

subtitles.original: 痛みを感じて研ぎ澄ませ
subtitles.english: Feel the pain and sharpen yourself

subtitles.original: 古びたバンデージはいらない
subtitles.english: I don't need an old bandage

subtitles.original: Do what you want to do
subtitles.english: Do what you want to do

subtitles.original: 狙って 情けないね
subtitles.english: Aiming, how pathetic

subtitles.original: 言い訳ばかり conversation も勘弁
subtitles.english: I've had enough of conversations full of excuses

subtitles.original: 躓くの恐れちゃどこも行けないわ
subtitles.english: If you're afraid of stumbling, you won't go anywhere

subtitles.original: Stand up 今日はなんとなく
subtitles.english: Stand up, today somehow

subtitles.original: 牙を見せれば見させられる Nightmare
subtitles.english: If I show my fangs, I'm forced to see a nightmare

subtitles.original: 無感情になれるなら教えて頂戴
subtitles.english: If I can become emotionless, please tell me how

subtitles.original: Tell me A B C D H とかの合言葉 絞り出して I want to
subtitles.english: Tell me A, B, C, D, H etc passwords, squeezing them out, I want to

subtitles.original: Falling out falling out away 追いかける one more day
subtitles.english: Falling out, falling out away, chasing one more day

subtitles.original: 決める覚悟 迷いは捨て
subtitles.english: The resolution to decide, discard hesitation

subtitles.original: 風が止まっても研ぎ澄ませ
subtitles.english: Even if the wind stops, sharpen up

subtitles.original: 駆け引きなんていらない say
subtitles.english: I don't need any bargaining, say

subtitles.original: What you wanna say
subtitles.english: What you wanna say

subtitles.original: 指名通りの希望はブルー
subtitles.english: The hope as requested is blue

subtitles.original: 痛みを感じて研ぎ澄ませ
subtitles.english: Feel the pain and sharpen yourself

subtitles.original: 古びたバンデージはいらない
subtitles.english: I don't need an old bandage

subtitles.original: Do what you want to do
subtitles.english: Do what you want to do

subtitles.original: また見て見ぬふりの繰り返し
subtitles.english: Again, repeating pretending not to see

subtitles.original: ズタボロな心を
subtitles.english: A tattered heart

subtitles.original: 誰かのせいだとしたって何も変わりはしない
subtitles.english: Even if it's someone's fault, nothing will change
